message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get as close to my target price as possible.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $10,800 is closer to my asking price, I'm still a bit away from where I need to be.  I'm willing to come down to $11,200.  This leaves some room for both of us to be happy with the deal.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $11,000. I think this is a fair compromise.
